description: Now offered in denim, our Vanner Jean is a fresh take on one of our best-selling pant styles. It combines sculpting lines with great comfort and hold, cut with a flat front, a slit back pocket and a cropped hem that’s perfect for highlighting your favorite footwear.
Zip fly and button closure at center front
Front rise: 10.13" (25.4 cm); back rise: 14.38" (36.1 cm); inseam: 29" (72.8 cm)
title: Vanner Jean

description: An ornate style for day or evening, this cropped pant features embroidery inspired by traditional Romanian needlework and hand-beading on soft cotton canvas. The high-waisted pair is tailored with belt loops, enameled buttons and a flared leg sharpened by a center crease.
Zipper fly with snap button closure
Front rise: 11" (27.6 cm); back rise: 14.6" (36.7 cm); inseam: 27.5" (69 cm)
title: EMBROIDERED PANT

description: Our Gingham Romper is a perfect beach-to-street style with ties at the shoulders, a stretch drawstring waist and pockets for a tailored finish. Versatile and light, it layers well over swimwear or beneath a summer-weight blazer.
title: GINGHAM ROMPER

description: Our silk Brigitte Romper is printed with a geometric diamond motif inspired by Moroccan tapestry. This play on one of our design signatures can be worn as a cover-up or a tailored one-piece — easily transitioning from beach days to brunch.
title: BRIGITTE ROMPER

description: Zipper with hook-and-eye closure at side seam
title: ARIA TWEED SKIRT

description: Our tailored Skylar Pant is a new essential done in lightweight wool suiting with a satin-trimmed waist. Cut to a flattering ankle length, the pair is partially lined in stretch twill for a smooth fit.
Zipper with hook-and-eye closure at side seam
Front rise: 11.75" (29.5 cm); back rise: 15.75" (39.5 cm); inseam: 30" (75.3 cm)
title: SKYLAR PANT

description: A little him, a little her. Crafted in a mid-weight wool blend, our Holt Coat features a classic windowpane check, giving it a fresh, modern feel. It’s finished with crisp lapels, lacquered buttons and patch pockets.
title: HOLT COAT

description: A fresh take on a classic button-down. Cut in clean-lined cotton poplin, our Allison Top features a banded collar and chest pockets. Wear it with everything from jeans to tailored suiting.
title: ALLISON TOP

description: Part cozy sweater, part ladylike jacket. Our tweed Hollis Cardigan, accented with fringe and slit pockets, can bring a tailored note to anything from frilly blouses to t-shirts and jeans.
title: HOLLIS CARDIGAN

description: A fresh take on the crisp wear-to-work shirt. Revised with bohemian details, our Sophie Top is loose-fitting and easy in poplin, with a slit neckline and broad cuffs that cinch with fabric ties and cap off with crochet and fringe trims.
title: SOPHIE TOP

description: The epitome of easy elegance. Inspired by peasant styles, our Marissa Top is made of cotton poplin, detailed with openwork crochet-lace panels along the bib, side seams and lower sleeves. Tassel ties and button cuffs neatly finish off the design.
title: MARISSA TOP

description: Our iconic logo collection, reimagined as a handbag. Featuring a laser-cut logo charm, the Miller Canvas Tote can be carried by the handles or over the shoulder — great for days on the go.
Holds a 15" laptop, a pair of flats, a continental wallet, sunglasses and a phone
Height: 11.95" (30 cm); length: 15.54" (39 cm); depth: 5.58" (14 cm)
title: MILLER CANVAS TOTE

description: Eye-catching and chic, our Shelby Brocade Bootie is a style to carry you from workdays to date nights. The silhouette, contoured in a metallic floral brocade, hits at a flattering point above the ankle and is set on a comfortable block heel.
title: SHELBY BROCADE BOOTIE

description: Our iconic logo collection, reimagined as a handbag. Featuring a laser-cut logo charm, the Miller Canvas Tote can be carried by the handles or over the shoulder — great for days on the go.

title: MILLER CANVAS TOTE

description: With gradient lenses and a gold logo, our Stacked-T Rectangle Sunglasses are the epitome of chic. A graphic print inspired by our logo on the interior temples adds an unexpected touch. Includes a protective orange case.
title: STACKED-T RECTANGLE SUNGLASSES

description: Worn with nearly every look on our spring runway, this Skinny Wrap Belt lends a sharp finish to anything from long dresses to trench coats, floaty skirts and tailored pants. It's made from beautifully tanned leather with a D-ring closure for an adjustable fit.
title: SKINNY LEATHER WRAP BELT

description: Our Printed Tory Tote comes in an octagon graphic developed by legendary designer David Hicks. Finished with a laser-cut logo, it can be carried in hand or tucked neatly under the arm.
Holds a 15" laptop, a pair of flats, a continental wallet, sunglasses and a phone
Webbing and leather handles with 7.97" (20 cm) drop
Height: 11.95" (30 cm); length: 15.54" (39 cm); depth: 5.58" (14 cm)
title: PRINTED TORY TOTE

description: A fresh revival of one of our favorite silhouettes, the Nylon Belt Bag comes in an octagonal print developed by legendary designer David Hicks. Take a cue from our runway show by wearing it low on the hips or slung over one shoulder.
Holds a mini wallet, a phone and a card case
May be carried as a belt bag or shoulder bag
title: NYLON BELT BAG
